Body: I am following the steps given on the following cynogenmod official page.Step as given here.And  i am stuck on the get prebuilts apps as there is no such a script as get-prebuilts in the /android/system/vendor/cm directory.I tried to proceed further and executed the following queries> $ source build/envsetup.sh > $ breakfast nickiProblem is at the next step in which the script extract-files.sh does not execute properly giving following output,root@rnt-U410:~/android/system/device/sony/nicki# ./extract-files.sh ./extract-files.sh: line 11: ../common/extract-files.sh: No such file or directory./extract-files.sh: line 13: ../common/setup-makefiles.sh: No such file or directory./setup-makefiles.sh: line 37: ../../../vendor/sony/nicki/Android.mk: No such file or directoryroot@rnt-U410:~/android/system/device/sony/nicki# I did not proceed further. Please put some light on this. I am totally new to building roms and nightlies.Thank you in advance.
Title: Build CyanogenMod ROM for Sony Xperia M or any other android phone

history.Text: I am following the steps given on the following cynogenmod official page.[Step as given here.][1]And  i am stuck on the get prebuilts apps as there is no such a script as get-prebuilts in the /android/system/vendor/cm directory.I tried to proceed further and executed the following queries    > $ source build/envsetup.sh     > $ breakfast nickiProblem is at the next step in which the script extract-files.sh does not execute properly giving following output,    root@rnt-U410:~/android/system/device/sony/nicki# ./extract-files.sh     ./extract-files.sh: line 11: ../common/extract-files.sh: No such file or directory    ./extract-files.sh: line 13: ../common/setup-makefiles.sh: No such file or directory    ./setup-makefiles.sh: line 37: ../../../vendor/sony/nicki/Android.mk: No such file or directory    root@rnt-U410:~/android/system/device/sony/nicki# I did not proceed further. Please put some light on this. I am totally new to building roms and nightlies.Thank you in advance.  [1]: http://wiki.cyanogenmod.org/w/Build_for_nicki
Build CyanogenMod Android for Sony Xperia M or any other android phone
